blockmaker_chassis.name: Blockmaker Chassis
blockmaker_chassis.description: It's commonly known that machines have 'personality'.  Add me to a regular ol' machine stand and forever imbue it with 'blockmaker' personality.

blockmaker_plates.name: Blockmaker Plates
blockmaker_plates.description: Made from only the finest Molybdenum this side of Shimla Mirch.  Once installed, the Blockmaker is complete.

fuel_cell.name: Fuel Cell
fuel_cell.description: Hundreds of tiny power-pellets in each capsule provide gigajoules of energy to fuel the machines.

fuelmaker_case.name: Fuelmaker Case
fuelmaker_case.description: Placed on an assembled Machine Stand, this Fuelmaker Case makes a good case for a stand to become a Fuelmaker.

fuelmaker_core.name: Fuelmaker Core
fuelmaker_core.description: Install the Fuelmaker core and the final piece of the puzzle will be in place. Now you just need fuel to fuel the Fuelmaker.

machine_engine.name: Machine Engine
machine_engine.description: Install this engine, and your machine is one step closer to purring like the quintessential classic, thrumming like the deeply resonant inner chambers of Zille's enormous throat.

machine_stand.name: Machine Stand
machine_stand.description: This generic machine stand provides just the right foundation upon which many a machine can be built.  As with all good foundations, once assembled it cannot be moved.

metalmaker_mechanism.name: Metal Machine Mechanism
metalmaker_mechanism.description: The type of smooth, perfectly-honed mechanism you would expect from followers of Alph. Whatever function it is that this performs in the Metalmaker, it does it very, very well.

metalmaker_tooler.name: Metal Machine Tooler
metalmaker_tooler.description: Silvery, heavy, and glistening with hot oil, lump of machinery so beautiful, complex and well crafted that it must have been tooled in some kind of academy.

woodworker_chassis.name: Woodworker Chassis
woodworker_chassis.description: One of the four essential parts of the Woodworker, the chassis is essential in helping every upstanding wannabe woodworker gird their woodworkerly loin-parts and whittle their brown stuff into something wonderful.

woodworker_fuser.name: Woodworker Fuser
woodworker_fuser.description: The business end of the hardworking woodworking Woodworker, this is the bit that actually works the wood. Responsible for fusing planks into boards, boards into posts, posts into beams and dreams into reality (as long as you dream of wood).
